Clear.Label: clear
Clear.Description: A clear day. No penalties or modifiers.

Fog.Label: fog
Fog.Description: Fog reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons.

Rain.Label: rain
Rain.Description: Rain reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

DryThunderstorm.Label: dry thunderstorm
DryThunderstorm.Description: Dry thunderstorms are dangerous because the lightning can start fires and there is no rain to put them out.

RainyThunderstorm.Label: rainy thunderstorm
RainyThunderstorm.Description: The lightning will start fires, but the rain will put it out. The rain also reduces movement speed and shooting accuracy.

SnowHard.Label: hard snow
SnowHard.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

SnowGentle.Label: gentle snow
SnowGentle.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

BloodRain.Label: blood rain
BloodRain.Description: Anyone exposed to the blood rain for long enough will be driven into a berserk rage. Certain traits and psychic sensitivity influence the berserk effect.

ToxRain.Label: tox rain
ToxRain.Description: Tox rain makes creatures sick with toxic buildup. It also reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

Sandstorm.Label: sandstorm
Sandstorm.Description: Sandstorms reduce the accuracy of ranged weapons, slow people down, and get sand everywhere.

BlindFog.Label: blind fog
BlindFog.Description: A heavy fog that reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, as well as their maximum range.

Overcast.Label: overcast
Overcast.Description: Thick clouds obscure the sky, reducing light levels.

Blizzard.Label: blizzard
Blizzard.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

TorrentialRain.Label: torrential rain
TorrentialRain.Description: Torrential rain causes flooding. It also reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

VPE_RadioactiveFog.Label: radioactive fog
VPE_RadioactiveFog.Description: A Nuclear reactor's meltdown has freed a cloud of radioactive material. This fog will hinder ranged attacks until it dissipates.

VGE_DustCloud.Label: dust cloud
VGE_DustCloud.Description: A dense cosmic dust cloud has drifted across your sector, shrouding your gravship in particulate haze. Visibility is almost zero, and targeting systems are struggling to lock onto anything. The dust will eventually clear as the cloud drifts away.

VGE_ToxicDustCloud.Label: toxic dust cloud
VGE_ToxicDustCloud.Description: A drifting cloud of highly toxic cosmic dust has enveloped your gravship. Microscopic particulates are seeping into every exposed space, corroding surfaces and poisoning the crew.

VEE_FertileRains.Label: fertile rain
VEE_FertileRains.Description: Unusually nutrient-rich rainfall is sweeping across the region, boosting plant growth for its duration.

VEE_DustStorm.Label: dust storm
VEE_DustStorm.Description: A choking wall of wind-driven dust sweeps across the land, reducing visibility, slowing movement, and scouring anything left exposed.

VPE_Hurricane.Label: hurricane
VPE_Hurricane.Description: Extreme wind will cause a slowdown to everyone not under the roof.

RG_Windy.Label: Breezy
RG_Windy.Description: Consistent wind that reduces ranged weapon accuracy.

RG_Drizzle.Label: drizzle
RG_Drizzle.Description: Very light but prominent rain which slightly reduces ranged weapon accuracy and movement speed.

RG_FogStorm.Label: fog storm
RG_FogStorm.Description: Rolling fog and heavy wind reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons.

RG_FoggySnow.Label: foggy snow
RG_FoggySnow.Description: Heavy snow with fog that reduces ranged weapon accuracy, extinguishes fires and reduces movement speed.

OuterSpaceWeather.Label: outer space
OuterSpaceWeather.Description: It's... space. Try not to go outside.

VPEH_Bloodstorm.Label: bloodstorm
VPEH_Bloodstorm.Description: Mystical downpour of blood, caused by forbidden hemosage psycast. While non-hemogenic individuals are choking on blood, sanguophages regenerate hemogen and can cast psycasts without worrying about psychic heat.

VREA_PsychicStorm.Label: psychic storm
VREA_PsychicStorm.Description: Psychic storm is a supernatural phenomena that occurs during the periods of increased psychic activity.

AB_RedFog.Label: red fog
AB_RedFog.Description: Red fog reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons.

AB_VolcanicAsh.Label: volcanic ash
AB_VolcanicAsh.Description: A mixture of rock, mineral, and glass particles expelled from a volcano during a volcanic eruption. This creates a thick atmospheric layer that reduces ranged accuracy.

AB_VolcanicAshRain.Label: volcanic ash with rain
AB_VolcanicAshRain.Description: A mixture of rock, mineral, and glass particles expelled from a volcano during a volcanic eruption, precipitating with rain. This creates a thick atmospheric layer that reduces ranged accuracy.

AB_ForsakenNight.Label: forsaken fog
AB_ForsakenNight.Description: A preternatural darkness that seeps into your very soul. Even during the "day" brightness will be very low, so lighting is going to be absolutely essential. Nights are going to be REALLY dark.

AB_ForsakenRainyNight.Label: forsaken rain
AB_ForsakenRainyNight.Description: A preternatural darkness that seeps into your very soul. A freezing rain of supercooled water has started to drop from the darkened sky.

AB_ForsakenThunderstorm.Label: forsaken thunderstorm
AB_ForsakenThunderstorm.Description: A preternatural darkness that seeps into your very soul. Now with a dry thunderstorm! Isn't it great?

AB_AcidRainWeather.Label: acid rain
AB_AcidRainWeather.Description: Toxic gas emissions from nearby volcanically active calderas are precipitating in the form of dangerous acid rain. Acid rain has an adverse impact on flora and fauna, killing insect and aquatic life-forms as well as having impacts on human health. Acid rain reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

AB_PetalStorms.Label: petal storm
AB_PetalStorms.Description: A flurry of flower petals that improves mood but reduces visibility.

AB_ForsakenNight_Alternate.Label: forsaken fog
AB_ForsakenNight_Alternate.Description: A preternatural darkness that seeps into your very soul. Even during the "day" brightness will be very low, so lighting is going to be absolutely essential. Nights are going to be REALLY dark.

AB_ForsakenRainyNight_Alternate.Label: forsaken rain
AB_ForsakenRainyNight_Alternate.Description: A preternatural darkness that seeps into your very soul. A freezing rain of supercooled water has started to drop from the darkened sky.

AB_ForsakenThunderstorm_Alternate.Label: forsaken thunderstorm
AB_ForsakenThunderstorm_Alternate.Description: A preternatural darkness that seeps into your very soul. Now with a dry thunderstorm! Isn't it great?
